task.title: Create a Project
task.shortdesc: Steps for creating a JavaPM project and populating it with an initial set of files.

step.cmd: In File menu, select New Java PM Project.

choices.choice: To add all .properties files from a given source folder at once: In Tasks menu, select Add Source Folder to Project.
To add individual .properties files: In Tasks menu select Add File to Project.

To delete .properties files from the project:
Select one or more files from the file list.
In Tasks menu, select Remove File(s) from Project.

step.cmd: In File menu, select Save JavaPM Project to specify a file name for the JavaPM project file and save it.
